trans-unit.source:
\n

Makes the file handle inheritable by child processes.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This is not directly supported by Win32.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx Xxx00.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
Any request to open the file (by this process or another process) will fail until the file is closed.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx $xx xxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Allows subsequent opening of the file for reading.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: If this flag is not specified, any request to open the file for reading (by this process or another process) will fail until the file is closed.
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx $xx xxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
However, even if this flag is specified, additional permissions might still be needed to access the file.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxxxx$ xxxx xx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Allows subsequent opening of the file for reading or writing.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: If this flag is not specified, any request to open the file for reading or writing (by this process or another process) will fail until the file is closed.
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx $xx xxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
However, even if this flag is specified, additional permissions might still be needed to access the file.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxxxx$ xxxx xx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Allows subsequent opening of the file for writing.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: If this flag is not specified, any request to open the file for writing (by this process or another process) will fail until the file is closed.
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx $xx xxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
However, even if this flag is specified, additional permissions might still be needed to access the file.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxxxx$ xxxx xx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x
